data.title: Secretary Austin Signs Memo Withdrawing From the Pre-Trial Agreements in the 9/11 Military Commission Cases
data.meta_description: Secretary of Defense Lloyd J. Austin III signed a memo reserving for himself the specific authority to enter into pretrial agreements with the accused in the 9/11 military commission cases.
data.text: Today, Secretary Austin signed a memo reserving for himself the specific authority to enter into pre-trial agreements with the accused in the 9/11 military commission cases. In addition, as the superior convening authority, the Secretary has also withdrawn from the pre-trial agreements that were signed in those cases. The memo can be found here.
